ingredients: Spaghetti, Ground beef, Tomatoes, Garlic, Onion, Cheese
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Sauté garlic and onions, add beef, then tomatoes. Simmer and add cheese.
steps: 1. Boil spaghetti. 2. Cook beef and onions. 3. Add sauce and cheese.
recipeExplanation: A twist on the classic Bolognese with added cheese for extra flavor.

ingredients: Ground beef, Taco shells, Lettuce, Cheese, Salsa, Sour cream
instructions: Cook beef, season with spices. Assemble tacos with toppings.
steps: 1. Cook beef. 2. Prepare toppings. 3. Fill taco shells. 4. Serve.
recipeExplanation: Classic beef tacos with fresh toppings.

ingredients: Flour, Butter, Sugar, Brown sugar, Chocolate chips, Eggs, Vanilla, Baking soda
instructions: Mix ingredients, scoop dough onto baking sheet, and bake until golden brown.
steps: 1. Mix dry ingredients. 2. Cream butter and sugars. 3. Combine and fold in chocolate chips. 4. Bake at 180°C for 12 minutes.
recipeExplanation: Classic soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies.

ingredients: Fettuccine, Chicken breast, Cream, Parmesan cheese, Garlic, Butter
instructions: Cook fettuccine. Sauté chicken, make cream sauce with butter, garlic, and parmesan. Combine.
steps: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Cook chicken. 3. Prepare sauce. 4. Mix and serve.
recipeExplanation: A creamy and delicious pasta dish with tender chicken.

ingredients: Ladyfingers, Mascarpone cheese, Coffee, Cocoa powder, Sugar, Eggs
instructions: Dip ladyfingers in coffee, layer with mascarpone mixture, and chill.
steps: 1. Brew coffee. 2. Prepare mascarpone cream. 3. Dip ladyfingers in coffee. 4. Layer with cream. 5. Dust with cocoa and chill for 6 hours.
recipeExplanation: An Italian classic with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
